title: (Bot games) Remove sword of the occult and mejai's in Bot games
body:
so i created a smurf account and played bot games with my main account, when i frist played my bot game 4 champions at got a stacking item and fighting over the most stacks. Sword of the occult and mejai's in Bot games wrecks the game for anyone who isnt using it and for the new player experience. it changes the meta in the game to the point one person carries and ends the game, leaving you with just laning and not engaging with the game or the team

remove these items in bot games, its stupid and doesn't encourage teamwork

replies.body:
but the point of a bot game isn't to finish it as fast as you can to get easy IP. not everyone shares the same personal objective. some people want to experiment elements of late game but that never happens cause stacking items

which means i would have to try it in a normals and get flamed or reported if it doesn't work
Or play a custom game where there is plenty of CS and time....
It irritates me when I see super tryhards getting those two items. Sometimes both.
What if some people like to experiment with Mejai's and SotO?
the only reason I play bot games is to get mejais and occult stacks

Nope, stacking items are the best way to finish bot games as fast as possible. Bot games are either a way for fast wins or they're something you can play once or twice when you first start just to learn how the map works. They're never meant to be "serious" games. If you want to learn teamwork, play normals.
